snippet: In the first of this season’s Scene Stealers feature, the Carpetbagger talks to Corey Stoll, the actor who played Hemingway in “Midnight in Paris.”
abstract: In the first of this season’s Scene Stealers feature, the Carpetbagger talks to Corey Stoll, the actor who played Hemingway in “Midnight in Paris.”

headline.main: A Role That Was Good and True and Stole the Scene
